name: Soccer Saga
description:
Matching game for all you soccer and football fans. Switch and match soccer balls from all your favorite countries while you're watching the World Championship.

FUN way to learn about each country's soccer balls!

FIND big matches to create explosive combos and big bonuses!

Now available for iPhone and iPad!
-------------------------------
Join your friends in this epic quest through a world full of Soccer Balls. Take on this fun saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
-------------------------------
Soccer Saga features:
● Spectacular graphics that will leave you wanting for more
● Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
● lots of soccer balls to find and match!
● Earn achievements and challenge friends!
● Boosters to help with those challenging levels
● Endless hours of soccer fun

How to play: Swipe 2 balls to make them switch.
● match 3, 4, or 5 balls to clear
● each level has different goals for clearing balls
